properties.title: Adobe Sign List Templates
properties.tagline: Obtain a list of all the templates in your Acrobat Sign account
properties.creator: Chris Hughes

keyFeature.title: List All Templates
keyFeature.desc: Keep track of all the templates that exist throughout your Acrobat Sign account

keyFeature.title: Supports Sandbox Account
keyFeature.desc: Use the optional-sandbox switch to use with Sandbox account

keyFeature.title: Concise Output Format
keyFeature.desc: Output is intentionally concise to easily support directing to a CSV file for further analysis

content:
Key Features

List All Templates

Keep track of all the templates that exist throughout your Acrobat Sign account

Supports Sandbox Account

Use the optional --sandbox switch to use with Sandbox account

Concise Output Format

Output is intentionally concise to easily support directing to a CSV file for further analysis

Using Acrobat Sign List Templates

Java-based command-line tool to list all the library templates in an Acrobat Sign account (in CSV format)

Installing Acrobat Sign List Templates

Set-Up instructions:

  • Download Java 1.8, if you don't already have it installed on your machine
  • Add IP addresses to your allow list, if needed

As the tool makes use of the Acrobat Sign REST API, it is necessary to provide an integration key for your account

Usage

Execute the following command, replacing

  • <version> with the appropriate value for the release, such as 3.0.0
  • <integrationKey> with your integration key
  • [--sandbox] optional flag if the integration key is for a Sandbox account
java -jar dc-sign-list-templates-<version>.jar <integrationKey> [--sandbox]

Click Here To Go To Repo

Have Questions?

Contact Your Customer Success Manager For More Information!
